instructions:
Rub the mixture of oil, salt, pepper and garlic evenly over the frozen meat. Stand, rib bone down, on a
rimmed baking sheet between the two potatoes, placed like book ends. DO NOT THAW MEAT. Roast in a
400 F oven for about 1 hour and 15 minutes for rare *(remove at 135 F and rest for 5 minutes)*, or an
additional 10 minutes for medium rare. To insure that it is done to your liking, insert a thermometer after
about 1 hour of roasting.
ingredients: 1 rib of standing rib roast, frozen
name: One Rib For Two
